items.name: FS-11 Executioner
items.description: Popularized by actor Chip Messiter, who wore this in the action-rom-com-musical 'Lost My Heart to a Man in a Helmet.'

passive.name: Fortified
passive.description:
Further reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. 
 Provides 50% resistance to explosive damage.

items.name: CM-21 Trench Paramedic
items.description: The suit was once designed to hold a variety of battlefield medical equipment. Now it holds a generous supply of stims.

passive.name: Med-Kit
passive.description:
Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of stims by +2. 
 Increases stim effect duration by 2.0s.
